info.title: MyManga VN API
info.description: Vietnamese manga reading platform API - Provides access to manga library, chapters, user management, comments, and social features.

Toggle manga favorite status

This endpoint provides a single-call solution to toggle favorites.
If the manga is already favorited, it will be removed.
If the manga is not favorited, it will be added.
